attributes.action: Stop people that homeless sleeping on the street during covid!
attributes.additional_details:
The government is their to protect people and keep them safe not prioritize them

Because 13% of cases were people commited suicide were due to homelessness, now with the corona extra stresses of anxiety I don't want to see this number increase from 2019 - 2020.

After all we are all equal and it's about protecting lives!

If you know anyone is these circumstances Crisis offer help and support if you happen to know anyone who needs it the number is 08000 384838.
attributes.background:
I've been homeless and I know personally how worrying it can be not just for the Thier selvels but Thier families

This is putting people lives at risk for no reason, also could create a second outbrake of the virus

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced additional funding to support moves into the private rented sector, help
individuals to reconnect with friends or family, and extend or procure interim accommodation: https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/896650/24-6-20_-_Letter_to_All_LAs_with_annexes.pdf
